data.title: Hip Hop Artist Crooked I: Staying Sober In An Industry Where Drug Use Is Common - The Show Presents Sober House with Thor
meta_keywords: Hip Hop Artist Crooked I: Staying Sober In An Industry Where Drug Use Is Common
The Show Presents Sober House with Thor
data.meta_description: Crooked I is undoubtably one of the best rappers alive. He has worked with Tupac, Snoop Dogg, Dr. Dre, and Eminem. He shares his story of being on top of the music industry, all while struggling with alcoholism and drug addiction. He shares what it is like now to be on the top of the rap game, while also being sober in a predominately drug driven industry.
data.text:
He’s a former Secret Service Agent, former NYPD officer, and New York Times best-selling author. Join Dan Bongino each weekday as he tackles the hottest political issues, debunking both liberal and Republican establishment rhetoric.

If you can never get enough true crime... Congratulations, you’ve found your people.
